name: Soulmates (Steven KS)
description:
Controls

  • Move Ghost 1 - WASD
  • Move Ghost 2 - Arrow Keys
  • Past the three tutorial levels, press 3 to generate a new level if desired

Goal:

Make it to one of the exit of the graveyard by breaking the gravestones! (Pull the ghosts appart to bounce back and destroy whats in the middle :D )

✧･ﾟ: *✧･ﾟ:* *:･ﾟ✧*:･ﾟ✧･ﾟ: *✧･ﾟ:* *:･ﾟ✧*:･ﾟ✧
